metaTitle: RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV Los Alcazares | Penthouse from €339,900
metaDescription: Discover RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV in Los Alcazares, Murcia. Modern 2-bed penthouses from €339,900. Delivery May 2027. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV, an exceptional residential development in the heart of Antreos, Los Alcazares, Murcia. Developed by the renowned PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, this project offers sophisticated penthouse living with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in generously sized 67m² homes. Starting from just €339,900, RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV represents outstanding value on the Costa Blanca, positioned 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. With completion scheduled for May 1st, 2027, this is your opportunity to invest in a growing community that combines modern amenities with the authentic Mediterranean lifestyle. The development features contemporary design, quality construction standards, and direct access to some of the region's most desirable attractions including championship golf courses and pristine Blue Flag beaches.

locationSection.intro: Antreos in Los Alcazares is rapidly emerging as one of Murcia's most sought-after residential destinations. This charming coastal town combines authentic Spanish character with modern infrastructure and international appeal. The area has established itself as a haven for both permanent residents and international investors, with an increasingly diverse and welcoming community where English is widely spoken. Los Alcazares offers the perfect balance of peaceful coastal living and convenient access to major amenities. Property values have shown consistent growth of 8% year-on-year, making it an attractive investment destination. The town's strategic location provides easy access to airports, beaches, healthcare facilities, and recreational activities, while maintaining a relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere that residents cherish.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Schools: International schools with British curriculum options

propertyFeatures.intro: RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV sets new standards for new build excellence in Los Alcazares. Each penthouse is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, utilizing premium materials and contemporary construction techniques. The development prioritizes energy efficiency and modern comfort, featuring climate control pre-installation and double-glazed windows with thermal breaks. Every residence includes sophisticated finishes, quality ceramic flooring, and modern bathroom fixtures that create spaces both beautiful and functional. The developer's commitment to quality ensures these homes will retain and appreciate in value for years to come.

content.investmentSection: RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV represents a compelling investment opportunity in a market showing strong fundamentals. Los Alcazares has demonstrated consistent property value appreciation of 8% year-on-year, outperforming many competing coastal markets. At €2,200 per square meter, prices are remarkably 40% lower than comparable properties in Spanish island destinations, offering exceptional value for money. The rental market is equally attractive, with 7-night vacation rental rates averaging €800, providing solid income potential for investors seeking returns. The established international community and infrastructure development suggest further appreciation potential. Whether purchasing as a primary residence, holiday home, or investment property, RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV offers financial advantages combined with lifestyle benefits.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV?
faqs.answer: From €339,900. RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV offers penthouse properties with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in 67m² layouts. Only 1 unit currently available. Contact us for detailed pricing and current inventory.

faqs.question: When will RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV be completed?
faqs.answer: May 1st, 2027. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific delivery dates and move-in schedules can be confirmed upon reservation.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, an established developer with a strong reputation for quality construction in Los Alcazares and the surrounding Murcia region. They prioritize modern design, energy efficiency, and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. The Costa Blanca, particularly Los Alcazares, offers excellent value, established infrastructure, and strong appreciation potential with 8% year-on-year growth. The region attracts international buyers seeking Mediterranean lifestyle, quality healthcare, international schools, and diverse recreational activities.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents may need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE), and it's advisable to consult with a legal professional specializing in Spanish property law to understand your specific tax and residency obligations.

faqs.question: How far is RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV. The pristine Mediterranean coastline offers excellent swimming, water sports, and beach clubs perfect for relaxation and recreation.

faqs.question: What amenities are near RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes for healthcare; several championship golf courses for golf enthusiasts; and international schools offering British curriculum options for families.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs including transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registry fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV's pricing from €339,900 remains excellent value compared to other European coastal markets.

faqs.question: Do I need a visa to buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Purchasing property in Spain does not automatically grant visa rights, but property ownership combined with sufficient income may support visa applications. EU citizens enjoy freedom of movement. Non-EU citizens should consult immigration specialists regarding visa requirements based on their nationality.

faqs.question: How much are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property taxes (IBI) typically range from 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value. Additionally, rental income is taxed, and wealth tax applies in some regions. Non-resident property owners face different tax obligations. Professional tax advice is recommended for RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV purchasers.

content.conclusion: RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV represents a rare opportunity to invest in quality Mediterranean living at exceptional value. Developed by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE with delivery in May 2027, this Los Alcazares penthouse development offers modern comfort, strategic location, and strong investment fundamentals. With only 1 unit available and property values appreciating 8% annually, now is the moment to secure your place in this thriving community. Whether seeking a primary residence, holiday retreat, or investment property, RESIDENCIAL AIRE LIMPIO IV delivers lifestyle and financial rewards. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed information, virtual tours, and to discuss financing options. Our team of English-speaking specialists is ready to guide you through every step of the purchasing process and ensure your investment success.
